languages.text: [Обратиться к посланнику ренегатов] "Тебе лучше объясниться. И как можно убедительнее".

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться к посланнику ренегатов] "Тебе лучше объясниться. И как можно убедительнее".

languages.text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

[Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

languages.text: [反逆派の使節と話す]「さっさとお前たちのことを白状してもらおう。十分な説得力のある話をするのが身のためだ」
languages.original_text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

traits.locale_text: [反逆派の使節と話す]「さっさとお前たちのことを白状してもらおう。十分な説得力のある話をするのが身のためだ」

languages.text: [对叛军的特使开口]“我建议你赶紧把事情解释清楚，你最好能说服我。”
languages.original_text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

traits.locale_text: [对叛军的特使开口]“我建议你赶紧把事情解释清楚，你最好能说服我。”

languages.text: [Vous adresser à l'émissaire des renégats] « Je vous suggère de vous expliquer sur-le-champ. Et vous avez intérêt à être convaincant. »
languages.original_text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser à l'émissaire des renégats] « Je vous suggère de vous expliquer sur-le-champ. Et vous avez intérêt à être convaincant. »

languages.text: [Dirigirte al enviado de los renegados] «Le recomiendo que se explique de inmediato. Ya puede ser muy convincente».
languages.original_text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte al enviado de los renegados] «Le recomiendo que se explique de inmediato. Ya puede ser muy convincente».

languages.text: [Den Gesandten der Abtrünnigen ansprechen] "Ich schlage vor, dass Ihr Euch augenblicklich erklärt. Und ich rate Euch, überzeugend zu sein."
languages.original_text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

traits.locale_text: [Den Gesandten der Abtrünnigen ansprechen] "Ich schlage vor, dass Ihr Euch augenblicklich erklärt. Und ich rate Euch, überzeugend zu sein."

languages.text: [Hainlerin elçisine dön] "Derhâl durumu açıkla. Beni ikna etmeyi başarsan iyi olur."
languages.original_text: [Address the renegades' envoy] "I suggest you explain yourself immediately. And you had better be very persuasive."

traits.locale_text: [Hainlerin elçisine dön] "Derhâl bu durumu açıkla. Beni ikna etmeyi başarırsan iyi olur."
